basic.description:
An independent advanced project in the area of design, supervised and evaluated by faculty. 
NOTE  Application must be submitted by 15 March for Department approval. Consult faculty advisors or supervisor for detailed information.  The normal classroom time of 36 hours is spread over two terms.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Directed Studies Design

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A grade of B in DRAM342 or DRAM345, or permission of the Department.
